718555f-c.title: Manhattan: City Hall Place - Pearl Street
718555f-c.text:
(1)
Centre Street, south from Duane Street, showing the Municipal
Building.
About 1924.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
Another view of the Municipal Building as viewed southward on City
Hall Place from Pearl Street. Note on the right a portion of the New
York County Court House. St. Andrews R.C. Church (rear of same) appears
at the N.E. corner of City Hall Place and Duane Street. The cleared area
in the foreground, today (1937) is a part of the Federal Courts Building
site.
NEG 50o0G  February 25, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
z AAD 20S  51GE R A6
(3)
The same as No. 2. The low structure on the right is the Hall of
Records, occupying the west side of Centre Street, from Chambers to Duane
Streets.
Dctober 22, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
718555f-c.folder: City Hall Place & Pearl Street, Manhattan, NY

724765f.title: Manhattan: White Street - Pearl Street
724765f.text:
Whitehall Street, at the S.W. corner of Pearl Street.
About 1918.
Gift of E. M. Jenke.
724765f.folder: White Street & Pearl Street, Manhattan, NY
